name: Email Cleaner
description: A project that cleansup the posthog persons email proeprty after the person is identified and also sets the probability that its an actual person and not a bot

config.markdown: This plugin processes events to determine if an email comes from a free provider. Configure the list of free email providers and any internal domains.

config.name: Free Email Providers
config.hint: Comma-separated list of free email domains. Example: `gmail.com,yahoo.com`
